definitions.definition: One of a class of teachers of rhetoric , philosophy , and politics in ancient Greece.
A teacher who uses plausible but fallacious reasoning .
One who is captious , fallacious, or deceptive in argument .
Alternative form of sophister ( “ university student who has completed at least one year ” ) .

main_definition: One of a class of teachers of rhetoric , philosophy , and politics in ancient Greece.
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) A teacher who uses plausible but fallacious reasoning .
( figurative , by extension ) One who is captious , fallacious, or deceptive in argument .
( dated ) Alternative form of sophister ( “ university student who has completed at least one year ” ) .
